title: Burma: people of the river
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Milan Herzog
brief_description: The varied regions and ways of living in Burma - the rivers that serve as highways; the rice fields in the delta and river valleys; jungle that yields harvests of teakwood and bamboo; the village life; and the city of Rangoon, centre of commerce, transportation and ancient culture.
